long_description: This handy tool has all the features of bigger and more expensive tools but will fit on a keychain--and now it's available with colored handles! Durable anodized aluminum handles encase a stainless steel body and tools, ensuring long-lasting use. Spring-action scissors ensure smooth cutting action; flat Phillips screwdriver design engages Phillips screws using only two slots. Includes knife blade, tweezers, nail file, medium and small standard screwdrivers, bottle opener, ruler and rotating lanyard attachment. Assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts.
short_description: This handy tool has all the features of bigger and more expensive tools but will fit on a keychain--and now it's available with colored handles!
